name: places/ChIJ__-7AYNYwokRDemLX0eQCAc
formattedAddress: 26W W 84th St, New York, NY 10024, USA
adrFormatAddress: 26W W 84th St, New York, NY 10024, USA

originalText.text:
The tennis camp at KTC has been an absolute game-changer for my 2-year-old daughter. I can't emphasize enough how fantastic the coaches are. They approach teaching with intention, method, and infinite patience. Their professionalism shines through, yet they manage to create an environment that's wonderfully kid-friendly.

What's truly remarkable is the effort my husband puts in, driving uptown for an hour every Saturday morning, just to make sure our daughter doesn't miss a single session. That's a testament to how much she enjoys the class and the impact it's had on her.

We've eagerly signed up for every season this year, and we're already looking forward to the many years ahead as she progresses through the program. It's not just about tennis; she's gained valuable physical, motor, and life skills in such a short time.

KTC's tennis camp has become an integral part of our lives, and we couldn't be happier with the enriching experience it offers to our daughter. Thank you to the amazing team at KTC for making this journey so memorable!

originalText.text: My son recently joined Kids Tennis Company and loves it. They are fostering a love of the sport, great skills and a fun environment. He was new to tennis when he started and now looks forward to his weekly lesson. We are super happy here and are looking forward to continuing his learning with Coach Jonathan and the team!

He was new to tennis when he started and now looks forward to his weekly lesson. We are super happy here and are looking forward to continuing his learning with Coach Jonathan and the team!

originalText.text:
This is the first review I’ve ever written but KTC tennis classes has been wonderful for my kids since my older child started 1.5 years ago when he was 2.5 years old. It was very beneficial for him, so as soon as my younger one turned 18 months I also signed him up for classes with Jonathan. I’ve loved watching the kids grow and thrive in their confidence, skills, coordination, focus, and love of sports.

With so many tennis/sports classes to choose from, it can be hard to tell off the bat how one stands out from another. After a trial class with Jonathan it was immediately clear to me how well he understood and catered to each kids’ development, temperament, and how to communicate with them. He has a wealth of knowledge and professionalism when it comes to teaching young children tennis and beyond.

Jonathan is extremely intentional with each drill and sequence of activities - and quickly help me realise he was training their cognitive function as well as physical.

As a parent, I’ve come to really appreciate Jonathan’s direct, no-BS feedback to be helpful, and know that he has the best intentions for the children‘s development. At the same time I think you’ll get more out of the program and Jonathan’s expertise if you trust and communicate with him.

originalText.text:
Excellent coaching and staff. Jonathan and Coach JR are awesome. They focus on footwork and you can see marked improvement in my son’s tennis skills. They provide all equipment, snacks and a prize at the end of each session. All indoors in a church.

Highly recommend!

originalText.text: Our son has taken Jonathans class for 2 years, and we absolutely love his tennis program. We have recommended him to all of our friends on the UWS. He runs a wonderful program. Highly recommend him
